description: Evaluate the Engine Orchestrator's ability to make correct statistical decisions about when to apply the two-step refinement method.

gatekeeper.description: Data sufficiency check based on coupon collector bound (M >= n*log(n))

trigger_heterogeneity.description: CV of comparison counts indicates unbalanced data

trigger_uncertainty.description: CI width / n > 20% indicates high variance

decision_logic: IF (gatekeeper_pass) AND (heterogeneity_trigger OR uncertainty_trigger) THEN step2_triggered

sparse_data.description: Data too sparse, gatekeeper should block Step 2

sufficient_no_triggers.description: Sufficient data but no triggers activated
